name: dragon bone
description: A stout bone from a dragon.  Too large and thick to be used as a weapon.
A sturdy tooth from a fallen dragon.

name: fire dragon scale
description: A scale from a fire elemental dragon. You can feel the searing hatred by just holding it.

name: raw fire dragon hide
description: A raw hide harvested from a fire elemental dragon. Durable and highly resistant to fire.

name: tanning fire dragon hide
description: A treated fire dragon hide, undergoing a chemical process before it becomes usable as a material.  You will be able to activate it to unroll and make use of it when it is done.

use_action.msg: You carefully unfold the fire dragon hide and shake it clean.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The fire dragon hide isn't done yet.

name: fire dragon hide
description: Prepared hide from a fire dragon.  Durable and extremely resistant to fire, it is used to make armors.

name: ice dragon scale
description: A scale from an ice elemental dragon. You can feel the solemn coldness by just holding it.

name: raw ice dragon hide
description: A raw hide harvested from an ice elemental dragon.  Durable and highly resistant to ice.

name: tanning ice dragon hide
description: A treated ice dragon hide, undergoing a chemical process before it becomes usable as a material.  You will be able to activate it to unroll and make use of it when it is done.

use_action.msg: You carefully unfold the ice dragon hide and shake it clean.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The ice dragon hide isn't done yet.

name: ice dragon hide
description: Prepared hide from an ice dragon.  Durable and extremely resistant to ice, it is used to make armors.

name: electric dragon scale
description: A scale from an electric elemental dragon. You can feel the searing hatred by just holding it.

name: raw electric dragon hide
description: A raw hide harvested from an electric elemental dragon. Durable and highly resistant to electric.

name: tanning electric dragon hide
description: A treated electric dragon hide, undergoing a chemical process before it becomes usable as a material.  You will be able to activate it to unroll and make use of it when it is done.

use_action.msg: You carefully unfold the electric dragon hide and shake it clean.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The electric dragon hide isn't done yet.

name: electric dragon hide
description: Prepared hide from an electric dragon.  Durable and extremely resistant to electric, it is used to make armors.
